betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Automate Divinerpg and Advent of Ascension ores! (not the only way...)

The ability of Terra chickens to resonate with various types of matter is quite remarkable, but in terms of uses, it's pretty underwhelming.
Thanks to a bit of astral magic, though, I can make my own modified chickens!
Was really getting tired of searching for ascended sapphire!
betterquesting:10.name:8: Chickens aren't great... Let's fix them!
